price: (Ẹsan náà wá láti ọ̀dọ̀) Olúwa àwọn sánmọ̀, ilẹ̀ àti ohun tó wà láààrin méjèèjì, Àjọkẹ́-ayé. Wọn kò sì ní ìkápá ọ̀rọ̀ lọ́dọ̀ Rẹ̀.
arabic: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā al-raḥmāni lā yamlikūna min'hu khiṭāban
